results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: coefficient [x^k] of the polynomial Product_{i=1..n} (x + q^i) in row n, column 0<=k<=n, and q = 4.
comment: Triangle T(n,k), read by rows, given by [4,12,64,240,1024,4032,16384,...] DELTA [1,0,4,0,16,0,64,0,256,0,1024,0,...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 01 2011
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1430
formula: T(n,k) = 4^n*T(n-1,k) + T(n-1,k-1) with T(0,0)=1. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 01 2011
mathematica: p[x_, n_, q_]= If[n==0, 1, Product[x + q^i, {i,n}]];
Table[CoefficientList[p[x, n, 4], x], {n, 0, 10}]//Flatten (* modified by _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 20 2021 *)
program: flatten([[T(n,k,4) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..10)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 20 2021
if k lt 0 or k gt n then return 0;
elif k eq n then return 1;
end if; return T; end function;
